entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:23 AM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -17.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -21.2°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27 except minus 18 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27 except minus 18 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023
